DOC.brief_summary: This study is aimed to collect the following Serbia-specific epidemiology data on hypercholesterolemia: patents characteristics, patients' management/treatment and physicians' standard practice. In addition, the aim is to determine the proportion of patients on lipid-lowering pharmacological treatment who have reached the LDL-C and HDL-C treatment goals.
DOC.brief_title: An Epidemiological Study Aimed to Record Standard Daily Practice in Managing Patients With Hypercholesterolemia
DOC.criteria: Patients with hypercholesterolemia currently receiving a lipid lowering agent Pregnancy and lactation.
DOC.keyword: Standard daily practice in managing patients with hypercholesterolemia
